title: Great! An Aurelion Sol Skin!!!

replies.body:
How about Heimer?

4 years lol

Cute. 
{{champion:6}} Try 6 years.
Both of them are getting skins this year. But yes, Urgot needs it more seeing as 2/3 skins he has are 520 skins and one is a legacy skin.
He's got one coming sometime this year. Just gotta wait
You mean {{champion:202}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} right?

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XzY1vok3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-31T16:55:33.888+0000)
>
> You mean {{champion:202}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} right?

IM triggered
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/a1/Are_You_Serious_Emote.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20180706203529
You forgot {{champion:81}} {{champion:99}}

+{{champion:17}} 

P.S. Riot has basically admitted they are kinda biased when it come to which champions get skins.

It's our fault. They put the manpower towards skins for champions who have proven to sell skins.

With that in mind, considering the fact a lot of Kled, Camille, and Sol players are perfectly fine not owning their only skin, why risk the effort making a new one?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I think Camille should get a Sewn Chaos skin. I made the suggestion a while back. 

Shears for her legs (with little handles at the knees), spools from her thighs that shoot needles and thread for her E, a yarn ball for her shield, and a hexagon of needles stabbed into the ground with yarn between them for her ultimate. 

It'd be great.
they need skins asap and also ivern, orn and kayn plus tahm and velkoz

Everyone except {{champion:427}}{{champion:240}}{{champion:164}} can wait. {{champion:516}}and{{champion:141}} are relatively new and {{champion:223}}and{{champion:161}}  got a solid roster of skins already.

imo, kled deserves that position but they can all come sooner that expected though. tahm only has 2 skins though while velkoz only needs another skin to remove him from the below 3 skins tier so its not yet solid for me.

Vel'Koz and Tahm solid roster of skins? They both have one joke 750 RP skin. Vel then has one release and one after-release skin while Tahm has only release skin. Even If we said that Vel doesn't need any new skin, how high exactly must one be to consider Tahm having solid roster of skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahpe,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XzY1vok3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-07-31T16:55:21.147+0000)
>
> Everyone except {{champion:427}}{{champion:240}}{{champion:164}} can wait. {{champion:516}}and{{champion:141}} are relatively new and {{champion:223}}and{{champion:161}}  got a solid roster of skins already.

vel koz has 3 skins. tahm only has 2 skins and his last skin was released probably 2 or 3 years ago.
Tahm’s skins are second to old crabgot in how horrible they look. That ornage monster frog thing is not a “solid roster” neither is thag slimy gray thing.

true, forget these ones. well except kayn (who is imo one of the harder champs to pull a skin off, so i understand there is no one yet) and velkoz - did vel really need one atm? (i dont play vel so idk)

i agree with kayn. vel needs one because his last skin was released in 2016, plus he only has 3 skins atm while kench has 2 and same with velkoz, his last skin was released in 2016. April to be exact.
Shacos last was in 2015 so velkoz can wait

{{champion:421}}

I want to die.
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

What about {{champion:6}} ? 
6 years of waiting for him
It is coming brother, works of art take time.
{{champion:203}} pls
Project Kled?

hm.. tango Camille could really work but who would be her dancepartner?

blood moon irelia no doubt about that one.
Her dance partner be someone with hextech parts?(idk, Heimerdinger and Camille) Just a thought.
HEIMER?!?!?! ewww never ever! she too sexy and noble for a little fluffy weird scientist. hm... maybe...Jayce or Viktor - at least better than heimer LOL
weird trailer with Camille dancing to dodge Viktor's Death Ray, both dancing to whatever beat there is.
{{champion:203}}

Well if we're going with the standard they had for Aurelion...

- Turtle rider {{champion:240}}.
- Breadstick {{champion:164}}.
- Lowbudget Troll {{champion:48}}.
I'd buy Breadstick Camille.
Honestly... me too.
Baker Pantheon vs. Breadstick Camille... THE SHOWDOWN OF THE CENTURY!

{{champion:164}} Camille skin?

What about...

* Butter Knife Camille (Part of the Baking Skin line)
funny idea :D but i thought more of a headhunter skin for her with purple blades. akalis headhunter skin just reminded me how awesome and underrated this skinline is
Agree
IMO riot needs more {{champion:11}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:21}} skins. They have been getting overlooked the past couple of seasons.
I hope {{champion:99}} gets a fresh one. All of her skins are stale and the last time she got a skin was dunno... 24,3 times ago?
It's just a shame that the skin seems so mediocre imo

How about a skin that's worth the 2 year wait. not some cheap copy paste mecha skin.

its the same with cyber pop... i mean super galaxy kindred.

its a complete contrast of skin for all the wrong reasons.

true. i personally could see prehistoric/guardian of the sands kled, officer/tango/headhunter camille... and so on. 

mecha is an okay skinline... but like program neither the best nor the worst, but more in the lower sections of good skinlines

I love the animations on the new sol skin, with the exception of the 'walking' animation where he bobs up and down, it stretches the back part of his body which warps the underbelly of the ship and it looks weird.

I'm still waiting on Oni trundle.  It doesn't even have to be a fancy skin.  Like 975 and just gives him an Oni outfit, one of those big tetsubo iron clubs, and big horns and bam there you go.

Also, Sakura Zyra... why is taking so long for that to be a thing?  It's so easy and so obvious.

I was disappointed to see another Ashe skin, especially since she already has an Epic and Legendary. 

The rest however are fantastic. Mecha A'Sol and Mafia Braum look fantastic! Not sure how I feel about the Cosmic skins. I hope maybe that Riot will have some kind of story or game mode involving Cosmic and Dark Star and perhaps some interacting with the Super Galaxy? Idk the entire time I look at them I think of giant celestial bodies fighting each other like in Gurren Lagan's final moments. 

But I'm definitely wanting something in-depth for the skins for seeing how many there are and for what reasons did Riot make an entire line up aside from them looking 'good'. I don't want it to be another Marauder/Warden line up where there's grouping and not a lot of reason behind it. I was kind of hoping there would be some context behind those skins as well.
